summary.para: Represents the state of a controller.

remarks.para: The dwPacketNumber member is incremented only if the status of the controller has changed since the controller was last polled.

summary.para: State packet number. The packet number indicates whether there have been any changes in the state of the controller. If the dwPacketNumber member is the same in sequentially returned XINPUT_STATE structures, the controller state has not changed.
structure containing the current state of an Xbox 360 Controller.
